hibernate-mapping.query: select d from DisputeTxn d inner join d.bcnxSettle b where b.rrn = :rrn and b.stan = :stan and b.slot = :slot
select count(d) from DisputeTxn d inner join d.bcnxSettle b where b.rrn = :rrn and b.stan = :stan and b.slot = :slot
select d from DisputeTxn d inner join d.bcnxSettle b where d.procc = :procc and b.rrn = :rrn and b.stan = :stan and b.slot = :slot
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from ( select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500001' and b.acqid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500002' and b.issid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '600001' and b.acqid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '700001' and b.issid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '800001' and b.issid = :id ) t order by t.date desc

select count(*) as num from ( select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500001' and b.acqid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500002' and b.issid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '600001' and b.acqid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '700001' and b.issid = :id union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '800001' and b.issid = :id ) as t

select * from ( select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500001' and b.acqid = :id and ( b.card like :card and b.rrn like :rrn and d.procc like :proc and b.stan like :stan and d.date between :start and :end ) union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '500002' and b.issid = :id and ( b.card like :card and b.rrn like :rrn and d.procc like :proc and b.stan like :stan and d.date between :start and :end ) union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '700001' and b.issid = :id and ( b.card like :card and b.rrn like :rrn and d.procc like :proc and b.stan like :stan and d.date between :start and :end ) union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '600001' and b.acqid = :id and ( b.card like :card and b.rrn like :rrn and d.procc like :proc and b.stan like :stan and d.date between :start and :end ) union select d.* from disputetxn d , bcnxsetl b where d.bcnxsetl_slot = b.slot and d.bcnxsetl_stan = b.stan and d.bcnxsetl_rrn = b.rrn and d.bcnxsetl_mti = b.mti and d.bcnxsetl_procc = b.procc and d.procc = '800001' and b.issid = :id and ( b.card like :card and b.rrn like :rrn and d.procc like :proc and b.stan like :stan and d.date between :start and :end ) ) as t order by t.date desc

hibernate-mapping.query: select d from DisputeTxn d inner join d.bcnxSettle b where d.date = :date and b.iss = :id and d.procc = :proc order by d.time
select d from DisputeTxn d inner join d.bcnxSettle b where d.date = :date and b.acq = :id and d.procc = :proc order by d.time
